items.content_html: ClipX.js is a lightweight JavaScript library for efficient clipboard management, text manipulation, and user feedback. It offers simple copy, cut, and paste operations, basic text formatting, and built-in toast notifications with customizable messages, all in a compact package.
items.title: MrAkshayAS/clipx: ClipX.js is a lightweight JavaScript library for efficient clipboard management, text manipulation, and user feedback. It offers simple copy, cut, and paste operations, basic text formatting, and built-in toast notifications with customizable messages, all in a compact package.

items.content_html: Milo is a lightweight, file-based HTTP framework designed for Deno. It simplifies the process of creating and managing HTTP routes and WebSocket connections by dynamically generating routes from the filesystem.
items.title: Nikolaycc/Milo: Milo is a lightweight, file-based HTTP framework designed for Deno. It simplifies the process of creating and managing HTTP routes and WebSocket connections by dynamically generating routes from the filesystem.

items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: MD Notebook is a lightweight Markdown previewer and editor with basic functionalities. The purpose of creating this project is to avoid opening XCode, VSCode etc. for merely previewing a markdown file on my local machine.
